111121.content:
Goku breathed in and out a bit harshly, sweat dripping down the pint-sized boy's face as he threw out a series of punches of kicks, though they were much slower than they usually were.

It was due to a battle with someone the Red Ribbon army hired to go after him and assinate him. This was an especially tough battle, since he had the ability to turn himself invisible, similar to the invisible man Yamcha had fought when the gang went to get a Dragon Ball from Baba. The major difference was that the invisible man fought a bit dirtier, since he also used special blades coated with a paralyizing agent that made the boy's movements sluggish, leaving him open to an onslaught of blows (and some slashes here or there for good measure) that took an effect on him.

Thankfully, before Goku could be finished off, Yamcha interfered by fighting him off alongside Krillin while Bulma carried the severely injured boy to safety.

It took a week or so for Goku to recover from his injuries with rest in a capsule house the gang took up residence in. However, while Goku managed to get some movement back in his body, he was still quite sluggish, as the paralyzing agent in his bloodstream hadn't completely worn off yet. Bulma, of course, advized him to take it easy until the chemical wore off, lest he strain himself unnecessarily. However, the boy wanted to get into shape so that the next time the gang encounted the assassin again, he'd be ready to pay him back for his tricks. As such, he snuck out of the capsule house to go off training at the fields.

Just as Goku was about to throw a punch out, he collapsed under his own weight as fell onto one knee, with his other foot keeping him from completely collapsing to the ground. With his breathing more shallow, Goku panted as he tried to catch his breath. As it turned out, the chemical also took its toll on his stamina, since it also had a paralyzing effect on his oxygen flow when he did strenious activity.

As soon as he caught his breath, the boy stood up on his feet and brushed some grass off of his pants. The boy quickly pivoted as he unexpectedly bumped into someone's legs, which knocked him on his butt. Looking up, Goku saw Bulma glowering down at him with her arms crossed.

"Uh.. Hi Bulma.. Didn't expect you to be up so soon.." Goku said to the girl, feeling a bit of dread from the look the turquoise haired girl was giving him. Unlike whenever she was angry with him, she looked more eerily calm than usual.

"I could say same the with you.." Bulma cooly said; "But, you know what else?" a tick mark grew on her forehead as she became louder in her voice; "I found you training your monkey butt off out here, despite the fact I told you to take it easy!!"

"But I-"

"No, I want you to open up those ear holes and listen!!!" Bulma grew more furious; "The reason I told you to take it easy is because I didn't want you to strain yourself!! What if you got seriously injured while training?!"

"I just wanted to be ready to fight that guy again if we-" Goku was interrupted in midsentence as Bulma's grew louder.

"And you think keeling over will somehow do the trick, is that it?!" Bulma threw her arms out in exasperation.

"Um well I-"

"Well nothing!!" Bulma grabbed onto Goku's tail before he could squirm away, impeding the boy's movements immediately as he lay on his stomach. As Bulma looked, she saw what appeared to be the waistband of Goku's white boxers peeking a bit out of his pants.Her mind briefly (no pun intended) flashed as she got an idea in her head, she reached her free hand down, and grabbed the waistband.

"Ow! What the heck?!" Goku found himself dangling right off the ground, courtesy of Bulma's grip on his underwear, weakly kicking his legs out in an attempt to get free; "Wh-what're you doing?!"

"Oh, this?" Bulma grinned as she lifted him up more; "It's called a wedgie.."

"Whatever it's called, it hurts!" Goku yelped as Bulma bounced him a little by the boxers.

"Maybe you should've thought of that before you decided to do something so stupid.." Bulma hissed; "In fact, I think I've found a new way to drive my point into your thick skull.."

"Nonono wait, put me down!" Goku tried to squirm out, but in his weakened state, he could do nothing as Bulma started walking a bit further into the fields, while carrying the boy by his underwear no less.

"After I'm done, maybe then you'll actually learn something.." Bulma whispered.
